title: Alice Tale in Phantasmagoria - Novel Updates
genre: Action   Adventure   Comedy   Drama   Fantasy   Gender Bender   Harem   Romance   Shoujo Ai   Tragedy
tags: Adventurers   Beastkin   Beautiful Female Lead   Character Growth   Charming Protagonist   Childcare   Cute Children   Death of Loved Ones   Demi-Humans   Demons   Dungeons   Elves   Eye Powers   Game Elements   Grinding   Lack of Common Sense   Level System   Loli   Magic   Magic Beasts   Male to Female   Master-Disciple Relationship   Monsters   Polygamy   Pregnancy   S*aves   Transported to Another World   Weak to Strong
author: Seto Yuuichi
description:
Arisugawa Akito suddenly finds himself in another world and another body, namely the one of the game character he just created, a female named Alice. This was not the work of virtual reality technology.

Join him as he struggles with the world, his new body and the puppies after his life as the dream of being the strongest feels suddenly far away…. as does being a man.

This novel had its name changed from “Nekama shiyou to omottara, isekai tensei shite onna ni nattandaga!” to “Alice Tale in the Fantastic World” on the 4th of November 2014.>
